Choose the Right One

GUIDE

How to Choose an AI Website Builder

Stop researching forever. Use this framework to choose in under an hour.

The Decision Framework

Answer 5 questions, get a recommendation. No more analysis paralysis.

Question 1: What Are You Building?

Simple business site (services, contact)

→ Durable or Hostinger

Portfolio / visual showcase

→ Framer or Squarespace

Content-heavy (blog, resources)

→ 10Web + WordPress

Ecommerce store

→ 10Web + WooCommerce

Complex / custom needs

→ Webflow

Question 2: What's Your Budget?

Under $5/month

→ Hostinger ($2.99/mo - only real option)

$10-20/month

→ Durable, Framer, Dorik (all ~$15/mo)

$20-30/month

→ Squarespace, Webflow, 10Web

Question 3: Do You Need to Export Code?

YES - I need to host elsewhere

→ Framer (React) or Dorik (HTML/CSS)

NO - Builder hosting is fine

→ Any builder (all include hosting)

WARNING: Wix and Squarespace DO NOT allow code export. You're locked in forever.

Question 4: How Important is Design Quality?

CRITICAL - I need beautiful design

→ Framer or Squarespace (designer-focused)

Important but not priority #1

→ Dorik, Webflow, 10Web

Just needs to look professional

→ Any builder will do

Question 5: Your Technical Comfort Level?

Complete beginner

→ Durable or Squarespace (easiest)

Comfortable with tech

→ Framer, Wix, Webflow

Developer / technical

→ Webflow or 10Web + WordPress

Quick Decision Matrix

If you want... Choose...
Fastest generation Durable
Best design Framer or Squarespace
Most powerful Webflow or 10Web
Cheapest Hostinger
Best balance Framer or 10Web

Still Can't Decide?

The safe bet: Start with Framer. Good design, fair price, code export option, solid AI.

The value bet: Start with 10Web. WordPress power, great AI, excellent for scaling.

The budget bet: Start with Hostinger. Unbeatable price, works fine for basic sites.

Quick recommendations to get started:
